When was the last time
you cried of Happiness?

Designed by professional world travellers to challenge your existence, make you cry of happiness, meet life long friends and never, ever forget that time when you finally decided to go on life changing “holliday”!

Thank you! You are in out waiting list, keep an aye on your inbox.

Why travel with us?

We are a community of professional travellers who design, plan and build each trip based on the things that they most love. Yes! The things they love!

People just do better things they love!

Imagine going to Everest Base camp with someone who’s entire life was dedicated to experience the Himalayas and the Nepalese culture or going on a Luxury all Iclusive Food & Drinks experience with an award winner chef in France? Well, perhaps an all inclusive party house with 20 other girls & guys to enjoy the full moon parties in Thailand, a boat cruise though Egypt, Skiing in the alps… Tell us your dream, and we will make it happen!
